name: Taughannock Falls
detail: Taller than Niagara. Flat gravel trail. Zero excuses.

name: Ithaca Falls
detail: Walk to the end of a residential street. Turn around. 150 feet of water.

name: Buttermilk Falls
detail: Swimming hole at the base. The cascade is the photo, the pool is the reward.

name: Eagle Cliff Falls
detail: You can walk behind it. Behind it. Do I need to say more.

name: Lucifer Falls
detail: Best viewed from the stone staircase above. The name is accurate about the climb.

name: Seneca Mills Falls
detail: Pull over, walk ten feet, done. The laziest waterfall on the list.

name: Watkins Glen Gorge
detail: 800 steps. 19 waterfalls. You'll earn every one of them, and the photos are unreal.

name: Carpenter Falls
detail: Remote. No crowds. The kind of waterfall you have to yourself.

name: Shequaga Falls
detail: Right in Montour Falls village. You can see it from the Dollar General parking lot.

name: Cowsheds Falls
detail: Inside Fillmore Glen. A rock overhang that looks like it was designed by a set decorator.
